[![](https://i1.wp.com/photos21.flickr.com/34637731_705fe85c99.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/34637731/ "photo sharing") [London, just before dusk](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/34637731/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
Lovely orange/red light on the Thames this evening.
